title: Enactive Anthropological-Ecological Dynamics-Integrated Instructional Design for Innovating Physical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational physical education theory and basic biomechanics concepts understanding
context.additional_context: Scientific approach training for developing physical strength utilization education programs for working professionals

learning_goals: They can explain core concepts of enactive anthropology and ecological dynamics by applying them to physical education contexts.
They can design physical education scenarios using the 3E (Exploration-Experience-Empathy) instructional method.
They can write a project report applying a mixed-methods approach that analyzes interactions between learners and the environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
